1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Generic relmap.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Relmap
6  ( -- * Type for relmap
7    Relmap' (..),
8    relmapId,
9
10    -- * Select from relmap
11    relmapLexmaps,
12    relmapSourceList,
13    relmapNameList,
14  ) where
15
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture      as O
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base          as B
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax        as S
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data          as D
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap   as C
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit   as C
22
23
24-- ----------------------  Relmap
25
26-- | Generic relmap.
27data Relmap' h c
28    = RelmapConst   C.Lexmap (D.Rel c)
29                             -- ^ Constant relation
30    | RelmapSource  C.Lexmap D.JudgeClass [S.TermName]
31                             -- ^ Retrieve a relation from a dataset
32
33    | RelmapCalc    C.Lexmap (C.RelkitConfl c) [Relmap' h c]
34                             -- ^ Relmap that maps relations to a relation
35    | RelmapHook    C.Lexmap (C.RelkitHook' h c)
36                             -- ^ Relmap that maps relations to a relation with hook data
37
38    | RelmapCopy    C.Lexmap String (Relmap' h c)
39                             -- ^ Relmap for environment of input relation
40    | RelmapNest    C.Lexmap (Relmap' h c)
41                             -- ^ Relmap for environment of nested relations
42    | RelmapLink    C.Lexmap
43                             -- ^ Relmap reference
44    | RelmapAppend  (Relmap' h c) (Relmap' h c)
45                             -- ^ Connect two relmaps
46
47instance Show (Relmap' h c) where
48    show = showRelmap
49
50showRelmap :: Relmap' h c -> String
51showRelmap r = sh r where
52    sh (RelmapConst  _ _)      = "RelmapConst "  ++ show (B.name r) ++ " _"
53    sh (RelmapSource _ p xs)   = "RelmapSource " ++ show p ++ " " ++ show xs
54
55    sh (RelmapCalc   _ _ rs)   = "RelmapCalc "   ++ show (B.name r) ++ " _" ++ joinSubs rs
56    sh (RelmapHook   _ _)      = "RelmapHook "   ++ show (B.name r)
57
58    sh (RelmapCopy   _ n r1)   = "RelmapCopy "   ++ show n  ++ joinSubs [r1]
59    sh (RelmapNest   _ r1)     = "RelmapNest "   ++ joinSubs [r1]
60    sh (RelmapLink   lx)       = "RelmapLink "   ++ show (C.lexName lx)
61    sh (RelmapAppend r1 r2)    = "RelmapAppend"  ++ joinSubs [r1, r2]
62
63    joinSubs = concatMap sub
64    sub r2 = " (" ++ sh r2 ++ ")"
65
66instance Ord (Relmap' h c) where
67    r1 `compare` r2  = relmapLexmaps r1 `compare` relmapLexmaps r2
68
69instance Eq (Relmap' h c) where
70    r1 == r2         = compare r1 r2 == EQ
71
72instance Monoid (Relmap' h c) where
73    mempty  = relmapId
74    mappend = RelmapAppend
75
76instance B.Name (Relmap' h c) where
77    name (RelmapSource _ _ _)       = "source"
78    name (RelmapAppend _ _)         = "append"
79    name (RelmapConst  lx _)        = C.lexName lx
80    name (RelmapCalc   lx _ _)      = C.lexName lx
81    name _ = undefined
82
83instance B.CodePtr (Relmap' h c) where
84    codePtList = concatMap B.codePtList . relmapLexmaps
85
86-- | Identity relmap.
87relmapId :: Relmap' h c
88relmapId = RelmapCalc lexId (const $ Right . C.relkitId) []
89
90lexId :: C.Lexmap
91lexId = B.def { C.lexToken = S.textToken "id" }
92
93
94-- ----------------------  Selector
95
96-- | Extract lexmap list from relmap.
97relmapLexmaps :: Relmap' h c -> [C.Lexmap]
98relmapLexmaps = collect where
99    collect (RelmapConst   lx _)     = [lx]
100    collect (RelmapSource  lx _ _)   = [lx]
101
102    collect (RelmapCalc    lx _ _)   = [lx]
103    collect (RelmapHook    lx _)     = [lx]
104
105    collect (RelmapCopy    lx _ _)   = [lx]
106    collect (RelmapNest    lx _)     = [lx]
107    collect (RelmapLink    lx)       = [lx]
108    collect (RelmapAppend  r1 r2)    = collect r1 ++ collect r2
109
110-- | List of 'C.RelmapSource'
111relmapSourceList :: Relmap' h c -> [Relmap' h c]
112relmapSourceList = relmapList f where
113    f rmap@(RelmapSource _ _ _) = [rmap]
114    f _ = []
115
116-- | List of name in 'C.RelmapLink'
117relmapNameList :: Relmap' h c -> [String]
118relmapNameList = relmapList f where
119    f (RelmapLink lx) = [C.lexName lx]
120    f _ = []
121
122relmapList :: O.Map (Relmap' h c -> [a])
123relmapList f = loop where
124    loop (RelmapAppend rmap1 rmap2)  = loop rmap1 ++ loop rmap2
125    loop (RelmapCalc _ _ rmaps)      = concatMap loop rmaps
126    loop m = f m
